it.polimi.hegira.zkWrapper

Class ZKserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.hegira.zkWrapper.ZKserver

  • public class ZKserver
extends Object
    Author:
    Marco Scavuzzo

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ZKserver(String connectString)
      Creates a connection to the ZooKeeper server and instantiates a Map that contains the SharedCounts representing the VDPid under migration for each table in the source database.

    • Method Summary

      • setMigrationStatus

        public boolean setMigrationStatus(String tableName,
                         MigrationStatus status)
                           throws Exception
        Sets the migration status for a given table.
        Parameters:
        tableName - The table name.
        VDPid - The migration status (i.e. the id of the VDP currently under migration)
        Returns:
        true if the operation , false otherwise.
        Throws:
        Exception - ZK errors, interruptions, etc.

      • getMigrationPaths

        public List<String> getMigrationPaths()
                               throws Exception
        To be used when recovering from a crash, in order to reconstruct previous migration status
        Returns:
        Returns the statuses of all the tables.
        Throws:
        Exception - Non retryable error.

      • deleteMigrationStatuses

        public boolean deleteMigrationStatuses()
                                throws Exception
        Method to be called after the migration process has completed. It deletes all of the migration statuses from ZooKeeper.
        Returns:
        true if the operation succeeded, false otherwise;
        Throws:
        Exception - Non retryable error.

      • setVDPsize

        public boolean setVDPsize(int p)
                   throws Exception
        Sets the size of **all** VDPs for a migration task.
        Parameters:
        p - The exponent for the number 10 (i.e. 10^p).
        Returns:
        true if the operation succeeded, false otherwise;
        Throws:
        Exception - ZK errors, interruptions, etc.

      • getVDPsize

        public int getVDPsize()
               throws Exception
        Gets the size relative to **all** VDPs for the migration task currently in place.
        Returns:
        The VDPs size.
        Throws:
        Exception - ZK errors, interruptions, etc.

      • isLocked

        public boolean isLocked(org.apache.curator.framework.recipes.shared.SharedCountListener listener)
                 throws Exception
        Says if queries should be locked, typically because the snapshot creation may be in progress.
        Parameters:
        listener - A listener which is asynchronously notified for lock changes.
        Returns:
        true if queries are blocked, false otherwise
        Throws:
        Exception - ZK errors, interruptions, etc.
